item_category: Live every moment with the ultra-handy 7 inch Alba tablet in silver. Designed with a bright IPS screen and easy to navigate display, this palm-sized device is perfect for keeping the little ones entertained. There's even a parental control app, so you can rest assured knowing they're safe from adult content. With front and rear cameras, take photos in an instant and enjoy 16GB of storage and up to 64GB with a micro SD card.
review_title: Very poor tablet that's crashes and won't run apps
Very slow and only worth what we paid
Wish it had reviews befor I brought this
Simply awful. Avoid at all costs.
Tablet stopped working after a week.
review_text: Nice long life battery. Lightweight. Very happy
Very bad only two days it’s stop working
I'm happy with my purchase my grandson loves it for the size
Worst tablet ever.I'm not happy with it at all.
It’s a extremely great table. It’s fast and effective which is an amazing. I would definitely recommend this my family and friends.
Brought this for my son and it was the best choice he loves it the graphics are great and the sound is perfect
Recommended buy it. Morden worth it

Very good option for those who need basic tablet functions including those job seeking and those learning at home.
Simple setup and very useful OTG option which enables downloading/uploading to a USB stick. Silicon covers make the tablet easy to handle.
My child loves the tablet. it is very easy to use and it looks great. it is a bit slow but that’s not a problem. I would recommend buying it!
Runs a bit than I'd liked but it's ok for my apps
The tablet did not work very good brightness was not to good and also did not like the update and needed to take the tablet back to not working
Very poor battery life , crashes alot and won't play certain apps (roblox which my daughter plays) would of returned if it wasn't for my daughter marking the screen.

This is a fair enough tablet. I only wanted a cheap & cheerful tablet for some quick internet searching & checking emails & this does everything I want. It's an Android tablet so has the Google Play Store allowing you to download many apps. Don't buy this thinking you're getting the latest Apple i-pad or Samsung tablet, you're getting a good more basic tablet that lets you get online. All round this is good & worth the money.
It stopped working after 5 days maybe it was to do with a game that my daughter downloaded and not enough memory on it . Also quite slow only suitable for a quick look online .
My daughter loves her new tablet Its gr8 for emails youtube and so much more
Not a bad device for the money ok for some things but not others runs abit slow and screen sensitivity can be troublesome.

This tablet is horrible it’s so slow and takes for ever to do anything on it. It’s fine for watching Netflix’s /films when you finally get it to load!  wished I had waited until there was reviews on this so I saved my money

Not a very good tablet, screen is very sensitive, when scrolling it acts like you've pressed to go onto a page. This has been made slightly better following us adding a protective screen. Also very slow to respond to touches.
Lit Tablet for the money
Have not had a good product screen bad

Great first tablet, can be abit slow. 
Good for game apps
Was not happy with that tablet I had exchange it with amazon fire 8 inch what is better.
battery flat charged it up next day flat doesn't hold the charge   waiting for shop to open
Good value easy to use
Excellent product for the price. My daughter loves it. Will recommend.

Kids first tablet , on paper good specs. Comes with 2 gel cases. Using device is painful, slow and crashes often. So much better alternatives at same price or a little more

Returned and exchanged, staff at local Argos excellent customer service.
Not happy with it the purchase & can't exchange it yet..
